description: This mapping has an ODRL privacy policy and the user can (or cant) have access to the data. Depending if the value provided by a IoT device (a person counter) is over 0.
user_template:
<#assign counterConf = "{\"url\" : \"https://helio-dev.data.linkeddata.es/api/upm-person-counting/data\"}">
<#assign counter=providers("URLProvider", counterConf)?eval>
<#list counter as elem>
[=elem]
</#list>
 
<#-- Declaring ODRL privacy policy -->
<#assign policy>
{
 "@context": "http://www.w3.org/ns/odrl.jsonld",
 "@type": "Set",
 "uid": "http://example.com/policy:1010",
 "permission": [{
   "target": "http://iot.device/asset:9898.data",
   "action": "read",
   "constraint": [{
           "leftOperand":  { 
                "@value": "[=tmp]", 
                "@type": "xsd:integer" 
                },
           "operator": "gt",
           "rightOperand":  { 
                "@value": "0", 
                "@type": "xsd:integer" 
                }
       } ]
 }]
}
</#assign>

<@action type = "ODRL" data=policy; result>
[=result]
</@action>
